verses.verse: וַיַּמְלִיכוּ֩ <S%H4427><s%> king יוֹשְׁבֵ֨י <S%H3427><s%> And the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <S%H3389><s%> of Jerusalem אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחַזְיָ֨הוּ <S%H274><s%> Ahaziah בְנ֤וֹ <S%H1121><s%> son הַקָּטֹן֙ <S%H6996><s%> his youngest תַּחְתָּ֔יו <S%H8478><s%> his place כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all הָרִאשֹׁנִים֙ <S%H7223><s%> all the eldest הָרַ֣ג <S%H2026><s%> had slain הַגְּד֔וּד <S%H1416><s%> in his stead for the band of men הַבָּ֥א <S%H935><s%> that came בָֽעַרְבִ֖ים <S%H6163><s%> with the Arabians לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <S%H4264><s%> to the camp וַיִּמְלֹ֛ךְ <S%H4427><s%> reigned אֲחַזְיָ֥הוּ <S%H274><s%> So Ahaziah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹרָ֖ם <S%H3088><s%> of Jehoram מֶ֥לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah פ

בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> old אַרְבָּעִ֨ים <S%H705><s%> Forty וּשְׁתַּ֤יִם <S%H8147><s%> and two שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> years אֲחַזְיָ֣הוּ <S%H274><s%> [was] Ahaziah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> when he began to reign וְשָׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year אַחַ֔ת <S%H259><s%> one מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> and he reigned בִּֽירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> His mother's עֲתַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H6271><s%> also [was] Athaliah בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter עָמְרִֽי׃ <S%H6018><s%> of Omri

גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> also ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> he הָלַ֔ךְ <S%H1980><s%> He also walked בְּדַרְכֵ֖י <S%H1870><s%> in the ways בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> for אִמּ֛וֹ <S%H517><s%> for his mother הָיְתָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become יֽוֹעַצְתּ֖וֹ <S%H3289><s%> was his counsellor לְהַרְשִֽׁיעַ׃ <S%H7561><s%> to do wickedly

וַיַּ֧עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> Wherefore he did הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD כְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> like the house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for הֵ֜מָּה <S%H1992><s%> like הָֽיוּ־ <S%H1961><s%> become ל֣וֹ יֽוֹעֲצִ֗ים <S%H3289><s%> for they were his counsellors אַחֲרֵ֛י <S%H310><s%> after מ֥וֹת <S%H4194><s%> the death אָבִ֖יו <S%H1><s%> of his father לְמַשְׁחִ֥ית <S%H4889><s%> to his destruction לֽוֹ׃

גַּ֣ם <S%H1571><s%> also בַּעֲצָתָם֮ <S%H6098><s%> also after their counsel הָלַךְ֒ <S%H1980><s%> He walked וַיֵּלֶךְ֩ <S%H1980><s%> and went אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with יְהוֹרָ֨ם <S%H3088><s%> with Jehoram בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַחְאָ֜ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel לַמִּלְחָמָ֛ה <S%H4421><s%> to war עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against חֲזָאֵ֥ל <S%H2371><s%> against Hazael מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרָ֖ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria בְּרָמ֣וֹת <S%H7433><s%> Ramoth-gilead גִּלְעָ֑ד <S%H1568><s%> Gilead וַיַּכּ֥וּ <S%H5221><s%> smote הָֽרַמִּ֖ים <S%H7421><s%> and the Syrians אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹרָֽם׃ <S%H3141><s%> Joram

וַיָּ֜שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> And he returned לְהִתְרַפֵּ֣א <S%H7495><s%> to be healed בְיִזְרְעֶ֗אל <S%H3157><s%> in Jezreel כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> because הַמַּכִּים֙ <S%H4347><s%> because of the wounds אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which הִכֻּ֣הוּ <S%H5221><s%> which were given בָֽרָמָ֔ה <S%H7414><s%> him at Ramah בְּהִלָּ֣חֲמ֔וֹ <S%H3898><s%> when he fought אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> against חֲזָהאֵ֖ל <S%H2371><s%> with Hazael מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> of Syria וַעֲזַרְיָ֨הוּ <S%H5838><s%> And Azariah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son יְהוֹרָ֜ם <S%H3088><s%> of Jehoram מֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> king יְהוּדָ֗ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah יָרַ֡ד <S%H3381><s%> went down לִרְא֞וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוֹרָ֧ם <S%H3088><s%> Jehoram בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אַחְאָ֛ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab בְּיִזְרְעֶ֖אל <S%H3157><s%> at Jezreel כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because חֹלֶ֥ה <S%H2470><s%> because he was sick הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> he

וּמֵֽאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> was of God הָיְתָה֙ <S%H1961><s%> become תְּבוּסַ֣ת <S%H8395><s%> And the destruction אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah לָב֖וֹא <S%H935><s%> by coming אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יוֹרָ֑ם <S%H3141><s%> to Joram וּבְבֹא֗וֹ <S%H935><s%> for when he was come יָצָ֤א <S%H3318><s%> he went out עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with יְהוֹרָם֙ <S%H3088><s%> with Jehoram אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> against יֵה֣וּא <S%H3058><s%> against Jehu בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son נִמְשִׁ֔י <S%H5250><s%> of Nimshi אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom מְשָׁח֣וֹ <S%H4886><s%> had anointed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> whom the LORD לְהַכְרִ֖ית <S%H3772><s%> to cut off אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> the house אַחְאָֽב׃ <S%H256><s%> of Ahab

וַיְהִ֕י <S%H1961><s%> came כְּהִשָּׁפֵ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> was executing judgment יֵה֖וּא <S%H3058><s%> And it came to pass that when Jehu עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> on בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> upon the house אַחְאָ֑ב <S%H256><s%> of Ahab וַיִּמְצָא֩ <S%H4672><s%> and found אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שָׂרֵ֨י <S%H8269><s%> the princes יְהוּדָ֜ה <S%H3063><s%> of Judah וּבְנֵ֨י <S%H1121><s%> and the sons אֲחֵ֧י <S%H251><s%> of the brethren אֲחַזְיָ֛הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah מְשָׁרְתִ֥ים <S%H8334><s%> that ministered לַאֲחַזְיָ֖הוּ <S%H274><s%> to Ahaziah וַיַּהַרְגֵֽם׃ <S%H2026><s%> he slew

וַיְבַקֵּשׁ֩ <S%H1245><s%> And he sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲחַזְיָ֨הוּ <S%H274><s%> Ahaziah וַֽיִּלְכְּדֻ֜הוּ <S%H3920><s%> and they caught וְה֧וּא <S%H1931><s%> he מִתְחַבֵּ֣א <S%H2244><s%> him (for he was hid בְשֹֽׁמְר֗וֹן <S%H8111><s%> Samaria וַיְבִאֻ֣הוּ <S%H935><s%> brought אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to יֵהוּא֮ <S%H3058><s%> him to Jehu וַיְמִתֻהוּ֒ <S%H4191><s%> and when they had slain וַֽיִּקְבְּרֻ֔הוּ <S%H6912><s%> him they buried כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> for אָֽמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> him Because said בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> they he [is] the son יְהוֹשָׁפָ֣ט <S%H3092><s%> of Jehoshaphat ה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> who דָּרַ֥שׁ <S%H1875><s%> who sought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> all לְבָב֑וֹ <S%H3824><s%> with all his heart וְאֵין֙ <S%H369><s%> there לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> So the house אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah לַעְצֹ֥ר <S%H6113><s%> to keep כֹּ֖חַ <S%H3581><s%> had no power לְמַמְלָכָֽה׃ <S%H4467><s%> still the kingdom

וַעֲתַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <S%H6271><s%> But when Athaliah אֵ֣ם <S%H517><s%> the mother אֲחַזְיָ֔הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah רָאֲתָ֖ה <S%H7200><s%> saw כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for מֵ֣ת <S%H4191><s%> was dead בְּנָ֑הּ <S%H1121><s%> that her son וַתָּ֗קָם <S%H6965><s%> she arose וַתְּדַבֵּ֛ר <S%H1696><s%> and destroyed אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all זֶ֥רַע <S%H2233><s%> all the seed הַמַּמְלָכָ֖ה <S%H4467><s%> royal לְבֵ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> of the house יְהוּדָֽה׃ <S%H3063><s%> of Judah

וַתִּקַּח֩ <S%H3947><s%> took יְהוֹשַׁבְעַ֨ת <S%H3090><s%> But Jehoshabeath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> יוֹאָ֣שׁ <S%H3101><s%> Joash בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> the son אֲחַזְיָ֗הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah וַתִּגְנֹ֤ב <S%H1589><s%> and stole אֹתוֹ֙ <S%H853><s%> מִתּ֤וֹךְ <S%H8432><s%> him from among בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> sons הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <S%H4428><s%> the king's הַמּ֣וּמָתִ֔ים <S%H4191><s%> that were slain וַתִּתֵּ֥ן <S%H5414><s%> and put אֹת֛וֹ <S%H853><s%> וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֵֽינִקְתּ֖וֹ <S%H3243><s%> him and his nurse בַּחֲדַ֣ר <S%H2315><s%> chamber הַמִּטּ֑וֹת <S%H4296><s%> bed וַתַּסְתִּירֵ֡הוּ <S%H5641><s%> be absent יְהוֹשַׁבְעַ֣ת <S%H3090><s%> So Jehoshabeath בַּת־ <S%H1323><s%> the daughter הַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> of king יְהוֹרָ֡ם <S%H3088><s%> Jehoram אֵשֶׁת֩ <S%H802><s%> the wife יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <S%H3077><s%> of Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> the priest כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for הִיא֩ <S%H1931><s%> he הָיְתָ֨ה <S%H1961><s%> become אֲח֧וֹת <S%H269><s%> (for she was the sister אֲחַזְיָ֛הוּ <S%H274><s%> of Ahaziah מִפְּנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> him from עֲתַלְיָ֖הוּ <S%H6271><s%> Athaliah וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not הֱמִיתָֽתְהוּ׃ <S%H4191><s%> so that she slew

וַיְהִ֤י <S%H1961><s%> become אִתָּם֙ <S%H854><s%> in בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> in the house הָֽאֱלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> of God מִתְחַבֵּ֖א <S%H2244><s%> And he was with them hid שֵׁ֣שׁ <S%H8337><s%> six שָׁנִ֖ים <S%H8141><s%> years וַעֲתַלְיָ֖ה <S%H6271><s%> and Athaliah מֹלֶ֥כֶת <S%H4427><s%> reigned עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> over הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> over the land פ
